name: Rural Sourcing
about:
<!--StartFragment-->

Rural sourcing, also known as[domestic sourcing](https://www.ruralsourcing.com/blogs/what-is-domestic-outsourcing/)or onshoring, is a viable solution for companies that need software development support, but want to keep the work closer to home. Itâ€™s the cost-effective alternative to offshore outsourcing (and just a smart decision).
